blocks.name: lidldomn1
blocks.content: If a (left) ideal (which is not the zero ideal) of a domain has a multiplicative identity element, the identity element is the identity of the domain. (Contributed by AV, 17-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:

thm lidldomn1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Domn ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ { c3 })∧ c4 ∈ c1)→(∀(s0 ∈ c1,((c4[c5]s0)= s0 ∧(s0[c5]c4)= s0))→ c4 = c6))
  ⊣ c2 =(LIdeal ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(× ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(1r ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)

blocks.name: lidlssbas
blocks.content: The base set of the restriction of the ring to a (left) ideal is a subset of the base set of the ring. (Contributed by AV, 17-Feb-2020.)

blocks.name: lidlbas
blocks.content: A (left) ideal of a ring is the base set of the restriction of the ring to this ideal. (Contributed by AV, 17-Feb-2020.)

blocks.name: lidlabl
blocks.content: A (left) ideal of a ring is an (additive) abelian group. (Contributed by AV, 17-Feb-2020.)

blocks.name: lidlmmgm
blocks.content: The multiplicative group of a (left) ideal of a ring is a magma. (Contributed by AV, 17-Feb-2020.)

blocks.name: lidldomnnring
blocks.content: A (left) ideal of a domain which is neither the zero ideal nor the unit ideal is not a unital ring. (Contributed by AV, 18-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm lidldomnnring(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdomn), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, csn(c3)), wne(c1, c4))), wnel(c5, crg))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clidl, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c0, cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cdomn), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, csn(c3)), wne(c1, c4))), wnel(c5, crg), wn(wo(wceq(c1, csn(c3)), wceq(c1, c4))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cdomn), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, csn(c3)), wne(c1, c4)), wn(wo(wceq(c1, csn(c3)), wceq(c1, c4))))
  3adant1(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, csn(c3)), wne(c1, c4), wn(wo(wceq(c1, csn(c3)), wceq(c1, c4))))
  biimpi(wa(wne(c1, csn(c3)), wne(c1, c4)), wn(wo(wceq(c1, csn(c3)), wceq(c1, c4))))
  neanior(c1, csn(c3), c1, c4)
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, cdomn), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, csn(c3)), wne(c1, c4))), wnel(c5, crg), wn(wo(wceq(c1, csn(c3)), wceq(c1, c4))), wn(wcel(c5, crg)))
  df-nel(c5, crg)
  notbid(wa(wcel(c0, cdomn), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, csn(c3)), wne(c1, c4))), wcel(c5, crg), wo(wceq(c1, csn(c3)), wceq(c1, c4)))
  3ad2antr1(wcel(c0, cdomn), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, csn(c3)), wne(c1, c4), wb(wcel(c5, crg), wo(wceq(c1, csn(c3)), wceq(c1, c4))))
  uzlidlring(c0, c1, c2, c5, c3, c4)

thm lidldomnnring(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Domn ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ { c3 } ∧ c1 ≠ c4))→ c5 ∉ Ring)
  ⊣ c2 =(LIdeal ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(c0[|`s]c1)
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  mpbird((c0 ∈ Domn ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ { c3 } ∧ c1 ≠ c4)), c5 ∉ Ring, ¬(c1 = { c3 } ∨ c1 = c4))
  adantl(c0 ∈ Domn, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ { c3 } ∧ c1 ≠ c4), ¬(c1 = { c3 } ∨ c1 = c4))
  3adant1(c1 ∈ c2, c1 ≠ { c3 }, c1 ≠ c4, ¬(c1 = { c3 } ∨ c1 = c4))
  biimpi((c1 ≠ { c3 } ∧ c1 ≠ c4), ¬(c1 = { c3 } ∨ c1 = c4))
  neanior(c1, { c3 }, c1, c4)
  syl5bb((c0 ∈ Domn ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ { c3 } ∧ c1 ≠ c4)), c5 ∉ Ring, ¬(c1 = { c3 } ∨ c1 = c4), ¬ c5 ∈ Ring)
  df-nel(c5, crg)
  notbid((c0 ∈ Domn ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ { c3 } ∧ c1 ≠ c4)), c5 ∈ Ring, (c1 = { c3 } ∨ c1 = c4))
  3ad2antr1(c0 ∈ Domn, c1 ∈ c2, c1 ≠ { c3 }, c1 ≠ c4, (c5 ∈ Ring ↔(c1 = { c3 } ∨ c1 = c4)))
  uzlidlring(c0, c1, c2, c5, c3, c4)
}
